description.raw:
Fixes #72.

Dependencies of a core library that are marked as PRIVATE in the ign_find_package and target_link_libraries calls are not being marked as Requires.private in the generated pkg-config .pc files; instead they are included as public Requires dependencies. By contrast, dependencies of components marked as PRIVATE_FOR in ign_find_package and PRIVATE in target_link_libraries are properly included in the generated .pc files.

A behavior change in homebrew caused the `libcurl.pc` file to be unavailable, which caused a bottle build failure, since ign-fuel-tools was requiring that, even though curl is a private dependency of fuel-tools. This PR fixes a variable name to ensure that the `Requires` and `Requires.private` variables are set properly for the core library (components were working correctly already).

I added a test as well.

A behavior change in homebrew caused the libcurl.pc file to be unavailable, which caused a bottle build failure, since ign-fuel-tools was requiring that, even though curl is a private dependency of fuel-tools.
